Text: The only comment I get and it's a Fucking wanker..
Haven't seen this one yet tho I've been trying to watch every damn war movie for the past 20 years. Thanks man.
I suppose you have a lot more to watch, I thought this was a good film for it's time; of course it isn't a Spielberg but still a good film. thank you for leaving a comment..

Here's one more comment: Thanks for your effort. You seem to have war movies I never even heard of. Very cool with all these English war movies. Too bad there isn't any English subtitles, though, but there's probably nothing you can do about that, right?
Sorry mate I just ripped most of them again and there is no subtitles at all..

I hope I can d/l it but thanks very much, I had forgotten about this movie memory after seeing it on our first television set in England. I am still trying to get "Carve her name with Pride" (Zsabo) and anything about Odette also as her son was a chum at school
Sorry I meant Simone not Odette however the only movie I know of about this group was Carve Her Name with Pride and I think Jack Warner was in it.
